Tony Hawks Pro Skater 2 Playthrough

Game: Tony Hawks Pro Skater 2
Published on Mon Jan 03 2022

It's been a while since I last played Tony Hawk 2, but happily it's a lot like riding a bike. I was able to get back in the groove pretty quickly and managed to clear the game 100% with 3 characters in a single sitting. It was a good day!

I've done a custom character first, which unlocked Spiderman. I then completed the game as Spiderman, naturally! After that I went back and did it again as Tony Hawk﻿.

I may come back and complete it with the other skaters﻿, but the roster is fairly massive with 12 more to go. Doing so however would unlock a fun space stage, which is cool﻿.

﻿
